elements.title: Buttons
elements.description: A collection of different types of buttons and states.

elements.title: Loader
elements.description: Here is a loader. Override width, height, border colors, and border width to customizer your loader. The loader-wrap is just a wrapping element to help position the loader in different settings (ie, buttons, centered, etc). The loader will work just fine without that wrapper.

elements.title: Toggle
elements.description: Here is a toggle. Override the color and fade() color of the toggle and its pseudo element when active to match your color scheme.
